title: Early Childhood Mathematics Education Design Utilizing Multimodal Learning Stations

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic pedagogy and mathematics education theories
context.additional_context: Design of digital-based mathematics pedagogy applicable to early childhood education settings.

learning_goals: One can explain the instructional design principles of movement interaction games for young children
One can design three or more activity sequences for implementing multimodal learning stations
One can develop an assessment rubric for acquiring early childhood mathematics concepts
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
